full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RNAM GSUM GYI GTOR CHOG RGYUN 'KHYER BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (SKYES MCHOG RDO RJE LEGS PA'I GTOR CHOG DAM CAN ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI 'DRA CHA TSAD LA 'KHYER BDE BA TSIGS BCAD DU SDEBS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KU SA LI ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BLA MA DAM PA'I GSUNG LAS BTUS TE, SHING SPRUL LHA BABS KYI DUS CHEN NYIN SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO MI DBANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI A'ANANTA'O, ,SLAR YANG CHOS SDE THAR PA GLING GI BTZAN KHANG DU GSOL KHA BAS RGYUN 'DON GYI CHED DU KUN DGA' ZHES PA SHING PHO STAG GI LO DAM CAN NOR LHA'I MNGON RTOGS SOGS GSAR DU BTZUG PA DZA YANTU, ,)
